People look for the shortcut. The hack. The shortcut is a lie. The hack doesn't get you there.
There is no easy way. There is only discipline. You get control other people. The only person you can control is you.
You have control over your mind. Witness. I'm nothing but weakness. I get the most
slowest stupid things. I eat the wrong foods. I don't sleep enough. I procrastinate at
waste time. I care too much about stupid things and not enough about important things.
In all those ways, I am weak. But I don't accept that. So often, the easy path calls us to be weak
for that moment to give in to short-term gratification. Discipline will not allow that.
Discipline can seem like your worst enemy. But in reality, it is your best friend. Discipline.
It will make you better and stronger and smarter and faster and healthier than anything else.
It is the most important thing to make you free. Discipline equals freedom.
